EmailTemplate.name: Bank Approved ROC Not Uploded Even After 6 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: Bank Approved ROC Not Uploded Even After 6 Days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!crmHeadName},
The ROC letter in the system for the Booking : {!bookingName} has not been uploaded in the system by {!rmName} for 6 days. Request to close this at the earliest for booking to proceed.
Thank You, Dynamix
